title: Project-Based Natural Water Resource Management Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Access to collaborative tools (Google Jamboard, Miro, etc.) using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the water cycle process and design solutions to address regional water scarcity issues.
Learners can utilize digital tools to construct virtual Earth models and visualize the distribution status of water resources.
Learners can present and evaluate creative proposals for water resource management policies based on project outcomes.

resources: Water resource data package (public data from Korea Meteorological Administration and Ministry of Environment)
Free version of 3D modeling software (e.g., Tinkercad)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
